      • getMapredInputFormat

        public static <K,V> java.lang.Class<? extends <any>> getMapredInputFormat(JobConf conf,
                                                                          java.lang.Class<?> rawClass)
        Checks if the given class is an org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat or an org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat and returns the appropriate adapter if needed.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        rawClass - a class to be used as input format
        Returns:
        an input format class (instance of org.apache.hadoop.mapred.InputFormat)

      • setupInputPath

        public static Path setupInputPath(java.lang.String inStr,
                                  JobConf conf)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        A convenience method to infer a job's input provided by the user. The input path is determined using the following criteria:
        1. If the input is a comma-separated paths, it is set as is and the method returns null
        2. If the input exists, it is set as is and the method returns the given input as a path
        3. The input is considered a glob. If files were found the method returns the input glob as a path
        4. The input's file name is considered a regular expression. A file pattern filter is set to use the regular expression and the method returns the input's parent folder as a path.
        Parameters:
        inStr - the input data location. It may be a file's path, a comma-separated paths, a glob expression or an expression of the form path/<filename as regex>, that is, a path where the file name is given by a regular expression.
        conf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        a path in case of using a single path or base path or null in case of the input being a comma-separated list of paths
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setupOutputPath

        public static Path setupOutputPath(java.lang.String outStr,
                                   Path basePath,
                                   Job job)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setupOutputPath

        public static Path setupOutputPath(java.lang.String outStr,
                                   Path basePath,
                                   JobConf conf)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Convenience method for setting a job's output path. If the output string is a relative path and basePath is specified, it will set the output to be a file relative to basePath. Additionally, it will remove the output if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        outStr - the output string as specified by the user
        basePath - a base folder to be used in case outStr is a relative path
        conf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        the final output path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • validateInputDataSet
